Title: The Secret World of Arrietty
Plot: Fourteen-year-old Arrietty (Bridgit Mendler, Saoirse Ronan, and Mirai Shida) and the rest of the Clock family live in peaceful anonymity as they make their own home from items that they borrow from the house's human inhabitants. However, life changes for the Clocks when a human boy discovers Arrietty.
Tagline: Ningen ni mirare te wa ikenai. Sore ga yukashita no kodomo-tachi no okite datta. (Do not be seen by humans. That's been the law of children of the underfloor.)
Writers: Mary Norton, Hayao Miyazaki, Keiko Niwa
Stars: Amy Poehler, Will Arnett, Mirai Shida
